ObjectId.description: A 24 character hexadecimal string representing a Mongo [ObjectId](https://bit.ly/3YPtGlU).

Reference.description:
A 24 character hexadecimal string representing a Mongo [ObjectId](https://bit.ly/3YPtGlU).
An object with an `id` field may also be passed, which will be converted into a string.

lte.description: Select dates occurring on or before.

gte.description: Select dates occurring on or after.

DateRange.description: An object representing dates falling within a range.

lte.description: Select values less than or equal.

gte.description: Select values greater than or equal.

NumberRange.description: An object representing numbers falling within a range.
